written.title: Simone Weil on Attention
written.rationale: Highly referenced concept bridging philosophical and artistic contemplation of focus, perception, and spiritual practice
written.verification: Confirmed through Weil's writings 'Gravity and Grace' and scholarly analyses of her work on attention as a form of prayer and ethical engagement

written.title: The Saint as Aesthetic Category
written.rationale: Critical framework for understanding sanctity as a complex cultural and artistic construct, particularly relevant to Rosalía's artistic project
written.verification: Referenced in multiple pages, connects religious studies, art history, and contemporary performance theory

written.title: Sincerity and Simulation
written.rationale: Explores linguistic and cultural translation as an economic and artistic process, connecting language, labor, and artistic production
written.verification: Connects references to language work, performance, and production value

written.title: Female Mystics
written.rationale: Comprehensive exploration of female mystical traditions, providing context for Rosalía's artistic and spiritual lineage
written.verification: Connects references to Saint Marina, Rabi'a al-Adawiyya, Mary of Egypt, and broader mystical practices

written.title: Zurbarán's Light
written.rationale: Investigates the visual and spiritual significance of light in Zurbarán's paintings, connecting to Rosalía's aesthetic and conceptual approach
written.verification: Connects to multiple references about visual aesthetics and spiritual representation

written.title: The London Symphony Orchestra
written.rationale: Critical missing link in understanding the production infrastructure of *Lux*, revealing the album's complex musical genealogy
written.verification: Confirmed collaboration with Rosalía on album recordings, significant classical music context

written.title: Labor as Production Value
written.rationale: Explores the economic and aesthetic dimensions of artistic labor in contemporary music production
written.verification: Critical theory sources on immaterial labor, music industry economics

written.title: The Mood Board as Practice
written.rationale: Analyzes the curatorial and creative methodology of visual-sonic assemblage in Rosalía's work
written.verification: Design theory, contemporary art practices, Rosalía's documented creative process

written.title: The 14 Languages
written.rationale: Investigates the linguistic complexity and translational strategies in *Lux*
written.verification: Confirmed multilingual aspects of the album, translation theory
